name: Flouse
short_description:
Simple personal account manager.
Programming Langage is C++ / Qt (trolltech).
Main features are:
- Works with MySQL
- Multi-user, multi accounts
- Easy and user-friendly
- .csv export ( usefull for OOo graphics )
- wizards
